name: stealthsol-circuits
description: Zero-knowledge circuits for StealthSol stealth address verification

scripts.setup-ceremony: snarkjs groth16 setup build/stealth_address.r1cs pot12_final.ptau build/stealth_address_0000.zkey
scripts.export-vkey: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/stealth_address_final.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.export-solidity: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/stealth_address_final.zkey build/Verifier.sol
scripts.prove: snarkjs groth16 prove build/stealth_address_final.zkey build/stealth_address_js/witness.wtns build/proof.json build/public.json
scripts.verify: snarkjs groth16 verify build/verification_key.json build/public.json build/proof.json
